docs.snippet: A combination of circumstances is drawing United States wool manufacturers away from the Australian and New Zealand wool markets. Last week, dispatches from Sydney indicated that the chief support of the market was supplied by Great Britain, Europe...
docs.lead_paragraph: A combination of circumstances is drawing United States wool manufacturers away from the Australian and New Zealand wool markets. Last week, dispatches from Sydney indicated that the chief support of the market was supplied by Great Britain, Europe and Japan. Americans held a poor fourth position from the standpoint of purchases.

headline.main: WOOL MARKET LAG SEEN 'DOWN UNDER'; Australian and New Zealand Sales Show U. S. Slipping as Big Purchaser TREND HAS BEEN GRADUAL Textile Industry Slump, Large Imports Here of Finished Goods Among Reasons

docs.snippet: CARACAS, Venezuela, Feb. 11 (AP) -- A United States delegate told the Inter-American Economic and Social Conference today that although there are limits to United States economic aid, Washington wants to know Latin America's needs.

docs.snippet: During the past week foreign exchanges fluctuated within a narrow range in a market that was extremely dull and lacked the enthusiasm of previous weeks. This was due in part to the abbreviated session caused by the holiday on Thursday, when banks...
docs.lead_paragraph: During the past week foreign exchanges fluctuated within a narrow range in a market that was extremely dull and lacked the enthusiasm of previous weeks. This was due in part to the abbreviated session caused by the holiday on Thursday, when banks here were closed in observance of Lincoln's birthday.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES; Week Ended Feb. 13, 1953

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Feb. 20 -- A musical headrest was patented this week by an Atlanta dentist. Designed to soothe the patient's nerves and take his mind off the operations going on inside his mouth, the device carries to his ear music that is "substantially...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Feb. 20 -- A musical headrest was patented this week by an Atlanta dentist. Designed to soothe the patient's nerves and take his mind off the operations going on inside his mouth, the device carries to his ear music that is "substantially inaudible" to others in the office.
docs.abstract: H S Gipe patents twisting machine

docs.snippet: Progressive weakness in the Canadian dollar and a strong undertone for the British pound sterling dominated the foreign exchange market during the past week. Amount of business transacted was only moderate and lacked the general activity that usually...
docs.lead_paragraph: Progressive weakness in the Canadian dollar and a strong undertone for the British pound sterling dominated the foreign exchange market during the past week. Amount of business transacted was only moderate and lacked the general activity that usually prevails.
